note.p: Children’s nurse. Daughter of James and Sarah Young of Stretton, Rutland. Nurse to the children of E. C. (Lena) Langton, 1867–71. Married William Tasker (1812/13–87), Sarah Elizabeth Wedgwood’s gardener, in 1871. Probably lived in Station Road, Downe, 1881. At Hope Villa, Hampton, Middlesex, from at least 1887.
Certificate of Marriage, William Tasker to Sarah Young, 8 August 1871, Downe, Kent (General Register Office, England)
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1178/31/53), 1881 (RG11/22/102/41, RG11/855/92/20), 1891 (RG12/616/15/23)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 May 2015)
